amendment.description: To modify the section relating to the grant of an easement and right of first refusal to the owner of Project No. 67.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5111 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5111 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S10536; text: CR S10536) To modify the section relating to the grant of an easement and right of first refusal to the owner of Project No. 67.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5111 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5111 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici.
